title: My old shop had good things but I can't remember what they were
body:
I remember having a couple really good deals on my old shop that I had the riot points to spend on, but not buying them because I didn't have the RP at the time, I now have the RP but all the deals are gone and I don't really care for any of the skins in my new shop.

Is there any way I can see which deals I had in my old shop and if so may I request one?

replies.body:
Absolutely! If you want one of the old skins here, just reply to this message letting me know which one and that it's okay for me to add the skin and remove the RP cost!

• Cottontail Teemo - 20% -       Discount Price: 780 RP				
• Pharaoh Nasus - 50% -           Discount Price: 260 RP				
• Riot Blitzcrank - 50% -             Discount Price: 487.5 RP				
• Frostfire Annie - 30% -            Discount Price: 682.5 RP				
• Ghost Bride Morgana - 70% - Discount Price: 292 RP				
• Big Bad Warwick - 50% -         Discount Price: 260 RP
Sure thing, I'd like to grab Pharoah Nasus, you have my permission to add the skin Pharaoh Nasus at the cost of its discount price: 260 RP {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Refresh your client and check for Pharoah Nasus ^_^!
Didn't even need to, I queued up for a game right after I checked the post, and I used it in that game, thank you!
